text: Two things spring immediately to mind.
This is the exact behavior you would get if your Python script does not have the executable permission set.
See the Apache tutorial for more information.
do you have something like this at the top before you print anything else?

text: Sounds to me like you're using a script written in Windows on a Unix machine, without first converting the line-endings from 0d0a to 0a.
It should be easy to convert it.
One way is with your ftp program;  transfer the file in ASCII mode.
The way I use with Metapad is to use File->FileFormat before saving.
